summary:
The Book of Revelation is the last book of the Bible, written by someone named John. It's full of strange and symbolic visions about the end of the world and Jesus' second coming. Scholars aren't sure who this John was, but many believe he was a Christian prophet. The book was likely written during the rule of Emperor Domitian.

John describes seeing dragons, beasts, and other mysterious figures. These visions have different meanings to different people. Some think they represent historical events, while others believe they predict the future. Still, others see them as symbolic of the battle between good and evil.
title: Book of Revelation
